abstracts.cdata!:
The Second State Pension Reform
            Technical Assistance Loan (TAL) Project for Brazil will
            upgrade state pension management (public officials'
            pension system for civil servants) thereby significantly
            reducing unwarranted pension claims, improving financial
            sustainability, strengthening state and federal
            institutions, and building reform constituencies. The
            project changes are: (i) reduce project scope to limit the
            activities to those that will be funded under the loan; (ii)
            revisions in results indicators to reflect reduction in
            project scope; (iii) extension of closing date by six months
            to December 31, 2011 to allow for completion of activities
            that are critical to the achievement of the project
            development objective (PDO); and (iv) reallocation of loan
            proceeds to reflect nature of contracts to be pursued under
            the project.
